ValidationRule.description: Mandate RFP Actual Date and RDE Amount on completion of Bid/No-Bid meeting
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Name = 'Bid / No-Bid (1.4)' && NOT( ISBLANK( Actual_Date__c ) ) && ( ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.RFP_Receipt_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.RDE_Amount__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter "RFP Received Date" and "RDE Amount" for the opportunity.Click Cancel below. Return to the Opportunity's Detail page and update missing data. Return to Opportunity Tollgate and enter data accordingly.
